subject: Re: Regarding Swing testing
msgSnippet: Since testing of Swing and GUI applications is a regular topic here, I m going to upload a preliminray version of chapter 13 of my forthcoming book Unit
messageBody:
Since testing of Swing and GUI applications is a regular topic here,
I'm going to upload a preliminray version of chapter 13 of my
forthcoming book "Unit Testing in Java". Mind, though, that this is
not the final version of the text and that the current layout has
nothing to do with the final layout.

Johannes
